DOC.brief_summary: The objective study evaluate compare patient preference FF ( Fluticasone Furoate ) FP ( Fluticasone Propionate Aqueous ) nasal spray treatment allergic rhinitis follow single-dose administration .
DOC.brief_title: Fluticasone Nasal Spray Patient Preference Study
DOC.criteria: allergic rhinitis literate clinical significant uncontrolled disease Use intranasal corticosteroid ( < 4 week FP [ brand generic ] , < 4 week exposure FF , < 4 week use INS ) Use intranasal medication < 1 week Use meds significantly inhibit CYP4503A4 Use perfume oral rinse study day Allergy/intolerance INS , antihistamine , excipients Positive pregnancy test female breastfeed Affiliation investigational site
